description: SSP-based RCP scenario following approximately RCP7.0 global forcing pathway but with low land use change from exeperiment ssp126. Atmosphere only with SST from experiment SSP3-70.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, scenario, SSP3, RCP7.0, atmosphere only,
long_name: SSP3-7.0, prescribed SSTs, with SSP1-2.6 land use

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the mid 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2055 41yrs

requirements.description: Sea surface temperature from experiment SSP3-7.
requirements.keywords: SSP3-7, SSP3, RCP7.0, SST, sea surface temperature
requirements.label: SSP3-70 SST

requirements.description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP7.0 long-lived gases, including CO2, N2O and halogenated gases.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, Well-mixed Greenhouse Gas, CO2
requirements.label: RCP70 Well Mixed GHG

requirements.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP7.0 short lived gas species including CH4, NOx, VOCs and CO.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, NTCF, Short-lived Gas
requirements.label: RCP70 Short Lived Gas Species

requirements.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP7.0 aerosols including BC and OC.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, NTCF, aerosol
requirements.label: RCP70 Aerosols

requirements.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP7.0 aerosol precursors including SO2 and NHy.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, NTCF, Aerosol Precursors
requirements.label: RCP70 Aerosol Precursors

requirements.description: Impose changing RCP2.6 land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest for SSP1.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP2.6, Land Use
requirements.label: SSP1 RCP26 Land Use

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use an Atmosphere model with chemistry
requirements.label: AGCM-Chem Configuration
